alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Maricopa; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 12:34AM MST until August 20 at 4:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Northeastern Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Southeastern La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 445 AM MST. * At 1234 AM MST, Gauge reports indicated flooding Columbus Wash. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sundad. This includes the following streams and drainages... Farmers Canal, Centennial Wash, Deadman Wash, Loudermilk Wash, Red Raven Wash and Copper Wash. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
